response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $15,000 to you, and I believe it has the potential to significantly impact your life positively. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $13,500. This offer represents a fair compromise that respects the value you see in the product while ensuring a profitable transaction for me. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 13500}
